resources.string: "I have not failed.I have just found 10,000 ways that won't work" \n\n-Thomas Edison
"However difficult life may seem,there is always something you can do and succeed at" \n\n-Stephen Hawking
"Life is 10% what happens and 90% of how you react" \n\n-Charles Swindoll
"Strive not to be a success,but rather to be of value" \n\n-Albert Einstein
"No one can defeat a powerful mind" \n\n- Chanakya
"Success is when your signature turns into autograph" \n\n-Dr.A.P.J Abdul Kalam
"The path from dreams to success does exist.May you have the vision to find it,the courage to get onto it,and the perseverance to follow it" \n\n-Kalpana Chawla
"There have been failures too.Failures teach you a lot...I had a lot of questions on the way" \n\n-Sunita Williams
"Take risks in life.If you win,you may lead.If you lose, you may guide" \n\n-Swami Vivekanand
"Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others" \n\n-Chetan Bhagat
